content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":28380,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c28e8391-f548-40db-a7f3-0d7a178d69c6/Picture1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c28e8391-f548-40db-a7f3-0d7a178d69c6/Picture1.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c28e8391-f548-40db-a7f3-0d7a178d69c6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":383,\"height\":339},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.    There are a  few types of contracts - from the simplest one between two individuals to a notary one. Usually, landlords dictate the circumstances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tThe contract includes the amount of the monthly rent and “Kaucja”, and does not include Czynsz.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tInclude everyone who is going to live with you in the apartment in the contract\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A signed contract is the basis for registration (meldunek) of the family members mentioned in it. It's important to mention everyone.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tBefore signing the contract, check all documents of the owner and real estate agent (if any).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tCheck the contract: the payment amounts, the terms, termination and breaking rules, the conditions for returning deposit (kaucja).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\tCheck the date of arrival and the date of the monthly payment, the date and method of obtaining the keys to the apartment (usually you get the keys at the time of signing the contract, but there are some exceptions). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tAgree on how monthly payment will happen. Usually, the owner's account number is mentioned in the contract and it's a good practice to follow.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
